Name: qed
Description: QED stands for quantitative estimation of drug-likeness and the concept was for the first time introduced by Richard Bickerton and coworkers
Description(日本語): 医薬品らしさを表す指標
Refarence: Quantifying the chemical beauty of drugs. Nature Chem 4, 90_98 (2012).

Name: MolWt
Description: The average molecular weight of the molecule
Description(日本語):
分子量の情報
- 分子量は、純物質の沸点や粘性、希薄溶液の沸点上昇や凝固点降下など様々な物性に影響を与える。

Name: HeavyAtomMolWt
Description: The average molecular weight of the molecule ignoring hydrogens
Description(日本語): 水素を抜かした分子量(MolWt)

Name: ExactMolWt
Description: The exact molecular weight of the molecule
Description(日本語):
分子量の情報 (質量分析などで必要)
- 分子量は、純物質の沸点や粘性、希薄溶液の沸点上昇や凝固点降下など様々な物性に影響を与える。

Name: NumValenceElectrons
Description: The number of valence electrons the molecule

Name: NumRadicalElectrons
Description: The number of radical electrons the molecule has (says nothing about spin state)
Description(日本語): ラジカルになっている電子の数

Name: MaxPartialCharge
Description(日本語):
分子内で極大となる部分電荷の大きさ
- 分子内の電荷の偏りは、Hardな反応の時に影響がある。

Name: MinPartialCharge
Description(日本語):
分子内で極小となる部分電荷の大きさ
- 分子内の電荷の偏りは、Hardな反応の時に影響がある。

Name: BCUT2D_MWHI
Description: This is the lowest eigenvalue of the connectivity matrix having atomic mass as diagonal elements. Off-diagonal elements depend on the bond order .BCUT2D descriptors have proven very effective for QSAR/QSPR studies due to their good discriminative power . Being dependent on the connectivity matrix and atomic mass, it contains information on molecular size and topology.  MWHI : highest eigen value by molecular weight

Name: BCUT2D_MWLOW
Description: This is the lowest eigenvalue of the connectivity matrix having atomic mass as diagonal elements. Off-diagonal elements depend on the bond order .BCUT2D descriptors have proven very effective for QSAR/QSPR studies due to their good discriminative power . Being dependent on the connectivity matrix and atomic mass, it contains information on molecular size and topology. MWLOW :  lowest eigen value by molecular weight

Name: BalabanJ
Description(日本語): トポロジカル指標J（グラフ不変量としての距離和s iに基づく）
Description_Detail:
rdkit.Chem.GraphDescriptors.BalabanJ(mol, dMat=None, forceDMat=0)
Calculate Balaban’s J value for a molecule

Arguments

mol: a molecule

dMat: (optional) a distance/adjacency matrix for the molecule, if this is not provide, one will be calculated

forceDMat: (optional) if this is set, the distance/adjacency matrix will be recalculated regardless of whether or not _dMat_ is provided or the molecule already has one

Returns

a float containing the J value

Name: BertzCT
Description: A topological index meant to quantify "complexity"
Description(日本語): 分子の複雑さを表す指標(結合の本数起因の自由度+C以外の重原子の存在による自由度(原子の多様性)_)
Description_Detail:
rdkit.Chem.GraphDescriptors.BertzCT(mol, cutoff=100, dMat=None, forceDMat=1)
A topological index meant to quantify “complexity” of molecules.

Consists of a sum of two terms, one representing the complexity of the bonding, the other representing the complexity of the distribution of heteroatoms.

“cutoff” is an integer value used to limit the computational expense. A cutoff value tells the program to consider vertices topologically identical if their distance vectors (sets of distances to all other vertices) are equal out to the “cutoff”th nearest-neighbor.
Refarence: S. H. Bertz, J. Am. Chem. Soc., vol 103, 3599-3601 (1981)

Name: Chi4n
Description: Similar to Hall Kier Chi4v, but uses nVal instead of valence. This makes a big difference after we get out of the first row
Refarence:
Similar to Hall Kier Chi4v, but uses nVal instead of valence
  This makes a big difference after we get out of the first row.
  **NOTE**: because the current path finding code does, by design,
  detect rings as paths (e.g. in C1CC1 there is *1* atom path of
  length 3), values of Chi4n may give results that differ from those
  provided by the old code in molecules that have 3 rings.

Name: MolLogP

Description_Detail:
改良Crippen(1999) オリジナルのGhose_Crippenを改良したものがALOGP98プログラムで，「Prediction of Physicochemical Parameters by Atomic Contributions」の論文に報告されています． https://pubs.acs.org/doi/10.1021/ci990307l Correlation plot for the fit of 9920 log P Star values:_ r2 = 0.918; σ = 0.677. ``` ケモインフォマティクスとLogP計算 by 新しい化学のカタチ
https://future-chem.com/logp/

Name: MolMR
Description(日本語): モル屈折率(MR)、経験的に決められた各原子の寄与の総和により分子屈折を計算。3412分子からなる別のセットはMRへの寄与の決定に用いられ、r2=0.997とσ=1.43であった。
Description_Detail: Wildman and G. M. Crippen JCICS 39 868-873 (1999)
